channel.title: [z525]Ranged Problem
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm having a problem with the ranged combat. What does not work : In pvp magic short bow does not hit only when i use special but emotes are working. Darkbow does hit without and with spec. emotes working. karils xbow doesnt hit but u see the emote.
Ranged combat vs npc does work 100%.
Magic works 100% Melee also works 100%
If you know how to fix this then please post or add me on msn.
Greetz
daniel_luiting@hotmail.com
